description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve issues that arise when using the Windows Update Standalone Installer (wusa) to uninstall updates before attempting to install an older cumulative update (CU):

1. Avoid using wusa for uninstalling Windows Updates to prevent conflicts.
2. Instead, use an alternative method, such as using the Windows GUI or command line tools for uninstalling updates to ensure smooth installation of older cumulative updates.

**Details**:
- This adjustment minimizes the risk of encountering installation issues post-update uninstallation and supports better patch management practices. (LLM Synthesized)
